column2:
Primary cut-off time for third party 
transactions
column3:
Close  for  new  transactions  (for  T  +  0)  in  favor  of  third  parties, 
except for bank-to-bank (MT2XX) series.
SLF and SDF windows are closed for Participants at 1315 hrs.

column2:

ILF Repo creation
column3: Participants should not initiate ILF Repos after 1325 hrs.

column2:
Final Cut-off Time
Closure of System for business
column3:
No further inputs are accepted.  With the closure of system 
for business, queue/Settlement processing will cease and any 
transactions still in queues will be rejected by the system.

End-of-day (EOD) processes e.g. generate reports/GL export (EOD) 
file, database maintenance for billing/statement printing purposes.

Commence  shutting  down  of  RTGS/SSS  application  software, 
obtain off-line backups.
